alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL ADAMS, NORTHWESTERN PIKE, HIGHLAND AND WESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1125 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Greenfield to 7 miles north of Sardinia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Marshall, Bainbridge, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Cynthiana, North Folk Village, New Market, Frankfort, South Salem, Sinking Spring, Danville in Highland County, May Hill, Austin and Knockemstiff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
